radiographic_examinations.findings: Negative results for known metallo-β-lactamases (blaIMP and blaVIM genes); presence of class 1 integron aminoglycoside acetyltransferase-6’ type 1b (aacA7) confirmed.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Retested E. coli isolates for NDM-1 using specific primers targeting the gene; result was consistent with NDM-1.
